settings.subtitle: About Us
settings.title: We Help Businesses Automate Bookings
settings.description:
Founded in 2023, Appointly was born from a simple observation: too many great businesses were losing customers because booking was too complicated.

We believe every service business deserves a beautiful, easy-to-use booking website that works 24/7. That's why we've made it our mission to help restaurants, salons, spas, fitness studios, and medical practices streamline their reservation process.

settings.title: Customer First
settings.description: We obsess over making our clients successful. Your growth is our success.

settings.title: Innovation
settings.description: Always improving, always learning, always evolving with the latest technology.

settings.title: Trust & Transparency
settings.description: Honest communication in everything we do. No hidden fees, no surprises.

settings.title: Excellence
settings.description: No shortcuts. We deliver quality every time, on time, with attention to detail.

settings.subtitle: Our Values
settings.title: What Drives Us
settings.description: Our core principles guide everything we do, from design to customer support.

settings.title: Our Impact in Numbers
settings.subtitle: Helping businesses across Europe grow every day
Our Story
settings.title: Born from Real Business Challenges
settings.description:
Our founders spent years working with service businesses and saw the same problems everywhere: complicated booking systems, missed appointments, and frustrated customers.

In 2023, we decided to build something better. A booking platform that's beautiful, easy to use, and actually helps businesses grow. Today, we're proud to serve hundreds of businesses across Europe.

settings.subtitle: Our Team

settings.description: We start with a free 30-minute consultation to understand your business, goals, and requirements.

settings.title: Design & Build
settings.description: Our team creates a custom booking website tailored to your brand. You'll see designs within 7 days.

settings.title: Launch & Grow

settings.quote: Working with Appointly was a game-changer. They took the time to understand our business and delivered exactly what we needed. Highly recommended!
The team is incredibly responsive and professional. They've been with us every step of the way, from design to ongoing support.
